name: @serverless/infrastructure
description: AWS CDK Infrastructure for Serverless Microservices

scripts.deploy:infra:dev: cdk synth --all -c environment=dev && cdk deploy --all -c environment=dev --require-approval never --verbose
scripts.deploy:infra:dev:verbose: cdk synth --all -c environment=dev --verbose && cdk deploy --all -c environment=dev --require-approval never --verbose
scripts.deploy:infra:prod: cdk synth --all -c environment=prod && cdk deploy --all -c environment=prod --require-approval never
